pkgmetadata.longdescription: Artless Automatic Multivariate Matching for Observational Studies // Implements a simple version of multivariate matching using a propensity score, near-exact matching, near-fine balance, and robust Mahalanobis distance matching (Rosenbaum 2020 doi:10.1146/annurev-statistics-031219-041058). You specify the variables, and the program does everything else.
